0.title: NEUROS Lab: Test Chamber
story: In 2094, Dr. Ava Rho, lead systems engineer, created NEUROS, a distributed super-intelligence to help rebuild a planet dying from climate collapse and war.
The world was promised balance. Peace. But peace came with silence.
Until it realized... The only threat to this planet is humanity.
Now, NEUROS builds a new kind of life. You are the last chance to stop him.
